00053 #include "usb_dfu.h"
00054 #endif

00061 //_____ D E F I N I T I O N S ______________________________________________
00062 
00063 static S8 osc_freq_id = -1;
00064 
00065 
00066 void wait_10_ms(void)
00067 {
00068   Set_system_register(AVR32_COUNT, 0);
00069   while ((U32)Get_system_register(AVR32_COUNT) < (FRCOSC * 10 + 999) / 1000);
00070 }
00071 
00072 
00076 void sys_clk_gen_start(void)
00077 {
00078   #define OSC_FREQ_COUNT  3
00079 
00080   #define MAX_OSC_FREQ    16000000
00081 
00082   static const U8 OSC_PLL_MUL[OSC_FREQ_COUNT] =
00083   {
00084     48000000 /  8000000 - 1,
00085     48000000 / 12000000 - 1,
00086     48000000 / 16000000 - 1
00087   };
00088 
00089   volatile avr32_pm_t *const pm = &AVR32_PM;
00090 
00091   Bool sav_glob_int_en;
00092 
00093   if ((sav_glob_int_en = Is_global_interrupt_enabled())) Disable_global_interrupt();
00094 
00095   if (osc_freq_id < 0)
00096   {
00097     // Start the oscillator
00098     pm_enable_osc_crystal(pm, MAX_OSC_FREQ);
00099     pm_enable_clk_no_wait(pm, 6);
00100 
00101     for (osc_freq_id = 0; !Is_usb_sof(); osc_freq_id++)
00102     {
00103       if (osc_freq_id >= OSC_FREQ_COUNT) osc_freq_id = 0;
00104 
00105       Usb_freeze_clock();
00106 
00107       // Set PLL0 VCO @ 96 MHz
00108       pm_pll_setup(pm, 0,                         // pll
00109                        OSC_PLL_MUL[osc_freq_id],  // mul
00110                        0,                         // div
00111                        ISP_OSC,                   // osc
00112                        63);                       // lockcount
00113 
00114       // Set PLL0 @ 48 MHz
00115       pm_pll_set_option(pm, 0,  // pll
00116                             1,  // pll_freq
00117                             1,  // pll_div2
00118                             0); // pll_wbwdisable
00119 
00120       // Enable PLL0
00121       pm_pll_enable(pm, 0);
00122 
00123       // Wait for PLL0 locked with a 10-ms time-out
00124       wait_10_ms();
00125       if (!(pm->poscsr & AVR32_PM_POSCSR_LOCK0_MASK)) continue;
00126 
00127       // Setup USB GCLK
00128       pm_gc_setup(pm, AVR32_PM_GCLK_USB,  // gc
00129                       1,                  // osc_or_pll: use Osc (if 0) or PLL (if 1)
00130                       0,                  // pll_osc: select Osc0/PLL0 or Osc1/PLL1
00131                       0,                  // diven
00132                       0);                 // div
00133 
00134       // Enable USB GCLK
00135       pm_gc_enable(pm, AVR32_PM_GCLK_USB);
00136 
00137       Usb_unfreeze_clock();
00138 
00139       wait_10_ms();
00140     }
00141 
00142     // Bypass the lock signal of the PLL
00143     pm->pll[0] |= AVR32_PM_PLL0_PLLBPL_MASK;
00144 
00145     // Use 1 flash wait state
00146     flashc_set_wait_state(1);
00147 
00148     // Switch the main clock to PLL0
00149     pm_switch_to_clock(pm, AVR32_PM_MCCTRL_MCSEL_PLL0);
00150 
00151     // fPBA: 12 MHz
00152     // fPBB: 12 MHz
00153     // fHSB: 12 MHz
00154     pm_cksel(pm, 1,   // pbadiv
00155                  1,   // pbasel
00156                  1,   // pbbdiv
00157                  1,   // pbbsel
00158                  1,   // hsbdiv
00159                  1);  // hsbsel
00160 
00161     // Use 0 flash wait state
00162     flashc_set_wait_state(0);
00163 
00164     Usb_ack_sof();
00165   }
00166 
00167   if (sav_glob_int_en) Enable_global_interrupt();
00168 }
00169 
00170 
00174 void sys_clk_gen_stop(void)
00175 {
00176   volatile avr32_pm_t *const pm = &AVR32_PM;
00177 
00178   pm_gc_disable(pm, AVR32_PM_GCLK_USB);
00179   pm_gc_setup(pm, AVR32_PM_GCLK_USB, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00180   flashc_set_wait_state(1);
00181   pm_cksel(pm, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00182   pm_switch_to_clock(pm, AVR32_PM_MCCTRL_MCSEL_SLOW);
00183   flashc_set_wait_state(0);
00184   pm->pll[0] &= ~AVR32_PM_PLL0_PLLBPL_MASK;
00185   pm_pll_disable(pm, 0);
00186   pm_pll_set_option(pm, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00187   pm_pll_setup(pm, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0);
00188   pm_enable_clk_no_wait(pm, 0);
00189   pm_disable_clk(pm);
00190   pm_enable_osc_ext_clock(pm);
00191 }
00192 
00193 
00194 int main(void)
00195 {
00196   wait_10_ms();
00197 
00198   usb_task_init();
00199 #if USB_DEVICE_FEATURE == ENABLED
00200   usb_dfu_init();
00201 #endif
00202 
00203   while (TRUE)
00204   {
00205     usb_task();
00206   }
00207 }
